mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AGREEMENTS (item_id, status, amount, due_at, terms) VALUES (#{itemId}, #{status}, #{amount}, #{dueAt}, #{terms})
mapper.select: SELECT id, item_id, status, amount, due_at, terms, created_at, updated_at, return_date FROM AGREEMENTS WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE AGREEMENTS SET status = 'COMPLETED', return_date = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS agreementId, a.status AS agreementStatus, a.amount AS amount, a.due_at AS dueAt, a.terms AS terms, a.created_at AS createdAt, i.id AS itemId, i.type AS itemType, i.title AS itemTitle, i.description AS itemDescription, i.status AS itemStatus, i.file_url AS itemFileUrl, i.file_type AS itemFileType, creditor_user.id AS creditorId, creditor_user.name AS creditorName, creditor_party.confirm_at AS creditorConfirmAt, debtor_user.id AS debtorId, debtor_user.name AS debtorName, debtor_party.confirm_at AS debtorConfirmAt FROM AGREEMENTS a JOIN ITEMS i ON a.item_id = i.id JOIN AGREEMENT_PARTIES creditor_party ON a.id = creditor_party.agreement_id AND creditor_party.role = 'CREDITOR' JOIN USERS creditor_user ON creditor_party.user_id = creditor_user.id JOIN AGREEMENT_PARTIES debtor_party ON a.id = debtor_party.agreement_id AND debtor_party.role = 'DEBTOR' JOIN USERS debtor_user ON debtor_party.user_id = debtor_user.id WHERE a.id = #{id}
SELECT id FROM AGREEMENTS WHERE status = 'ACCEPTED' AND due_at < NOW()

SELECT a.id, a.status, a.amount, a.terms, a.due_at AS dueDate, a.return_date AS returnDate, a.created_at AS createdAt, i.id AS itemId, i.title AS itemTitle, i.description AS itemDescription, i.type AS itemType, i.file_url AS itemFileUrl, creditor_user.id AS creditorId, creditor_user.name AS creditorName, creditor_user.phone AS creditorPhone, creditor_party.confirm_at AS creditorConfirmAt, debtor_user.id AS debtorId, debtor_user.name AS debtorName, debtor_user.phone as debtorPhone, debtor_party.confirm_at AS debtorConfirmAt, DATEDIFF(a.due_at, debtor_party.confirm_at) + 1 AS rentalDays, IF(a.status = 'COMPLETED' AND a.return_date > a.due_at, TRUE, FALSE) AS isOverdueReturn, CASE WHEN i.type = 'MONEY' THEN a.amount - IFNULL(t_sum.total_paid, 0) ELSE NULL END AS remainingAmount, CASE WHEN creditor_user.id = #{userId} THEN 'CREDITOR' WHEN debtor_user.id = #{userId} THEN 'DEBTOR' ELSE NULL END AS myRole FROM AGREEMENTS a JOIN ITEMS i ON a.item_id = i.id JOIN AGREEMENT_PARTIES creditor_party ON a.id = creditor_party.agreement_id AND creditor_party.role = 'CREDITOR' JOIN USERS creditor_user ON creditor_party.user_id = creditor_user.id JOIN AGREEMENT_PARTIES debtor_party ON a.id = debtor_party.agreement_id AND debtor_party.role = 'DEBTOR' JOIN USERS debtor_user ON debtor_party.user_id = debtor_user.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT agreement_id, SUM(amount) AS total_paid FROM TRANSACTIONS WHERE status = 'CONFIRMED' GROUP BY agreement_id) t_sum ON a.id = t_sum.agreement_id WHERE a.id = #{id}
SELECT ap.role, count(*) AS count FROM AGREEMENTS a JOIN AGREEMENT_PARTIES ap ON a.id = ap.agreement_id WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND (a.status = 'ACCEPTED' OR a.status = 'OVERDUE') GROUP BY ap.role

SELECT a.id, a.amount, a.due_at, ap.role, i.title AS itemTitle, i.description AS itemDescription, i.file_url AS itemFileUrl, DATEDIFF(a.due_at, CURDATE()) AS daysLeft FROM AGREEMENTS a JOIN AGREEMENT_PARTIES ap ON a.id = ap.agreement_id JOIN USERS u ON ap.user_id = u.id JOIN ITEMS i ON a.item_id = i.id WHERE DATEDIFF(a.due_at, CURDATE()) BETWEEN 0 AND 7 AND a.status = 'ACCEPTED' AND ap.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY due_at LIMIT 5

SELECT a.id, a.amount, a.due_at, ap.role, i.title AS itemTitle, i.description AS itemDescription, i.file_url AS itemFileUrl, DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), a.due_at) AS overDays FROM AGREEMENTS a JOIN AGREEMENT_PARTIES ap ON a.id = ap.agreement_id JOIN USERS u ON ap.user_id = u.id JOIN ITEMS i ON a.item_id = i.id WHERE a.status = 'OVERDUE' AND ap.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY due_at LIMIT 5
